name: HERDEZ Salsa Casera, Medium, 70 oz Jug – Authentic Mexican Homestyle Salsa for Tacos, Chips & Dips
short_description: Our most popular homemade-style salsa with a smooth, spicy taste. Pair with meat dishes or make it your go-to dip for tortilla chips.
Distinctively vibrant taste from a blend of sweet tomatoes, cilantro, onions and jalapeño peppers.
Made with delicious ingredients. Gluten free.
Deliciously complements chicken, pork, seafood, taco salads and more. Make it a savory part of breakfast, lunch and dinner meal prep.
Includes 1 each, 70-ounce jar of Herdez Salsa Casera Medium. Packaged for freshness and great taste.
product_description: Dip into bold, rich flavor and endless possibilities with medium heat HERDEZ Salsa Casera. Includes 1, 70-ounce jug of fresh-tasting salsa featuring a craveable combination of sweet tomatoes, onion, cilantro and jalapeño peppers. Refreshing hints of citrus and herbal notes of cilantro turn up the taste on everything from fish tacos, vegetable wraps, beef enchiladas, garden salads, and even egg dishes. It's an ideal pantry staple that makes a tasty topping for snacks or entrees, and pairs perfectly with chips and guacamole or bean dip. Enhance taco night, party spreads or meals any day of the week. The HERDEZ brand is the No.1 selling brand of salsa in Mexico. HERDEZ is a trademark of HERDEZ S.A. de C.V. sociedad anonima.

name: KYVAN Mild Salsa
short_description: MILD HONEY APPLE SALSA: This slowly simmered, natural salsa featuring fresh tomatoes and peppers is a sure way to excite your tastebuds. With a touch of honey combined with an array of spices, KYVAN Mild Honey Apple Salsa is a great compliment to any dish. Unlike typical salsas that we commonly see, it has a refreshing southern taste mixed with apples and fresh vegetables. One taste and the possibilities become unlimited.

FOOD FOR THOUGHT: Kettle cooked in small batches to retain nutrients, quality and flavor. We strive to service our customers by carefully creating premium, salsas that are Gluten Free, GMO Free, MSG Free and No High Fructose Corn Syrup. As our motto states: “One taste and you will Appreciate the Goodness!”

PREMIUM NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Diced Tomatoes(tomatoes, tomato juice, salt, citric acid, calcium chloride), Vinegar, Red Bell Peppers, Sugar, Green Bell Peppers, Honey, Dried Apples, Garlic, Salt, Onion, Starch, Spices, Cilantro
GREAT ON: burgers, chicken, eggs, lasagna, vegetables, salads, baked beans, sloppy joes, chili, baked potatoes, meat loaf, as a dip, traditional Mexican dishes and more!

OUR SPECIALTY: We specialize in innovative, in most cases, never- before-seen salsas and here’s the kicker, most of our products only use clean, natural ingredients. With flavor combinations that are unique to the market, our products are top quality, many of which are all-natural, that excite consumers with exceptional, mouthwatering flavors!

OUR MISSION: We are a destination for unique, great tasting condiments with a mission to grow our business the old fashioned way with honesty, integrity and hard work. We strive to service our customers by carefully creating premium, quality food products to nourish the body.

OUR CULTURE: Our culture is one that stresses energetic, proactive, focused and creative interaction with our customers, consumers and team. “Doing Good” is our top priority, and trust that this philosophy will enable us to “Do Well” also.

INNOVATION: We are evolving in innovation with new dimensions in “goodness”! While staying true to the roots, most of our authentic, satisfying products center on all-natural ingredients, with offerings that promote healthier lifestyles. Our products are top quality and created with natural ingredients in order to provide our customers with nourishing goodness! We provide customers with unique offerings that will have you coming back for more.
RESTAURANT-STYLE salsa in the comforts of your home that's been featured on major TV outlets and publications

16 oz jar—perfect for everyday snacking or entertaining
product_description: Savor the fresh, vibrant taste of mild salsa made from ripe tomatoes, crisp vegetables, and a delicate blend of spices. This flavorful salsa offers a smooth, approachable heat level that enhances without overpowering, making it perfect for all palates. Whether used as a dip, topping, or cooking ingredient, it delivers a wholesome and delicious addition to any meal.

name: Pace Mild Picante Sauce, 16 oz
short_description: One (1) 16 oz Jar of Pace Mild Picante Sauce
A picante sauce ideal for dips and toppings, made with hand-picked jalapenos and tomatoes picked at the peak of freshness
Savor the mild heat with our picante sauce
Enjoy Pace Picante sauce, crafted with vegetables grown in the USA, perfect for your favorite dips and toppings without any artificial additives
Gluten free and made with no artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives; Vegetarian
product_description: Get ready to fire up your taste buds with Pace Mild Picante Sauce, the ultimate flavor enhancer that guarantees to liven up any dish. With over 75 years of legendary flavor, Pace is the trusted, iconic brand that never compromises on quality. No artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives—just the real deal. Cinco De Mayo party? Tailgating before the big game? Or perhaps a sizzling summer grilling session? Pace Mild Picante Sauce is your go-to companion for all these occasions. Made with handpicked jalapenos and ripe tomatoes, this sauce will enhance your culinary creations with an exciting flavor that's authentically adventurous. Perfect for dipping tortilla chips, topping tacos, or drizzling over nachos, this picante sauce is versatile enough to elevate any meal. Whether it's taco Tuesday or a laid-back patio moment, Pace Mild Picante Sauce is here to make every bite an adventure. This sauce isn't just for dipping—use it as a cooking sauce to add a punch of flavor to your Mexican food favorites, from quesadillas to enchiladas. So why wait? Pick up the Pace and turn your next meal into a fiesta of flavor. With Pace Mild Picante Sauce, every dish is a celebration, every bite a journey. Let's get dipping, topping, and cooking with the sauce that brings excitement to your table.

name: Late July Snacks Medium Salsa, 15.5 oz Jar
short_description: One (1) 15.5 oz jar of Late July Snacks Medium Salsa
This thick and chunky medium salsa dip is packed with organic tomatoes, onions, garlic and jalapenos in a sofrito blended base
Vegetarian, organic salsa made with high-quality, non-GMO ingredients with no artificial flavors or preservatives for a tasty addition to your snacks and entrees
This medium tomato salsa isperfect for chips and salsa, nachos or taco night and makes a delicious recipe ingredient
Each 15.5 oz jar of Late July salsa offers about 14 servings, perfect for sharing with family and friends
product_description: Late July Snacks Medium Salsa has a zesty kick with bold flavors. This thick and chunky salsa is crafted with organic diced tomatoes, onions, garlic and jalapenos. The result is a hearty, chunky salsa in a sofrito blended base that highlights the flavors of all the high-quality ingredients with a balance of spice, so everyone can enjoy this salsa dip. The best parties need a few simple things — great friends, great stories and delicious food. These three things always come back together around a big bowl of Late July tortilla chips and a jar of our medium organic salsa. Each 15.5 oz jar of red salsa offers about 14 servings, perfect for sharing with family and friends. Elevate your taco dip, breakfast burritos and other favorites with our gluten free tomato salsa. It also makes the perfect addition to your favorite recipes, from chicken flautas to huevos rancheros. We care deeply about using the highest quality organic and non-GMO ingredients with no artificial flavors or preservatives, so you can enjoy snacks that are simple, pure and good. And we never sacrifice on taste. Unquestionable tasty goodness.
